Title: Research on Power Supply Traceability Mode Based on Blockchain
abstract: The current traceability mode of power supply in China mainly adopts the technologies of origin identification, traceability coding and RFID. This model has problems such as inconsistent traceability standards, inaccurate traceability information, and data distortion, which make it difficult for consumers to identify with the traceability results. To solve this problem, this paper proposes to track the transactions of each node of the power supply chain based on the blockchain smart contract and hash algorithm, achieve safe and reliable traceability of the power supply chain, improve the commercial value of traceable information, and increase the trust between each node of the supply chain.
